headline: Chips Ahoy and Oreo maker Mondelez sues grocery chain Aldi over similar packaging
summary: Snack brand giant Mondelez is suing grocery chain Aldi, alleging that the grocer’s store-brand snacks “blatantly” copied Mondelez packaging.

raw.headline: Chips Ahoy and Oreo maker Mondelez sues grocery chain Aldi over similar packaging
raw.summary: Snack brand giant Mondelez is suing grocery chain Aldi, alleging that the grocer’s store-brand snacks “blatantly” copied Mondelez packaging.

headline: Mondelēz International Joins the 100+ Accelerator to Help Advance More Sustainable Innovation at Scale
summary: Company becomes sixth corporate partner alongside AB InBev, The Coca-Cola Company, Colgate-Palmolive, Danone, and Unilever100+ Accelerator was created to rapidly pilot and scale solutions.Mondelēz International’s addition reinforces movement among world’s largest brands to collaborate on more sustainable innovation at scale. headline: Mondelez sues Aldi over packaging similarities
summary: Mondelez International, maker of Oreo and Chips Ahoy, has sued Aldi, alleging its store-brand packaging copies the design of Mondelez products.

raw.headline: Mondelez sues Aldi over packaging similarities
raw.summary: Mondelez International, maker of Oreo and Chips Ahoy, has sued Aldi, alleging its store-brand packaging copies the design of Mondelez products.
